1.name: ConsoleEmojiIssue
1.At: Using emoji in console output — low-severity/display issue, not always a bug

2.name: ClearAllDataNoConfirmation
2.At: clear_all_data has no confirmation — may be design choice rather than vulnerability

3.name: ConcurrencyConcern_Export
3.At: Re-instantiating StatEngine in export may be an inefficiency, not a correctness bug
